text:
Look, when I preheat the oven to 425, put the pizzas I made for dinner in that mutherfucker, and 15 minutes later they’re cooked, it doesn’t surprise anyone. It was built to do this. 

Why then are we so surprised in this country when the systems work the way they were designed?
